    Affin Bank Berhad Vacancies PERSONAL FINANCING CONSULTANT (SOUTHERN)

    November 25, 2020

    TOC

    • Job Description
    • Company Overview
    • How To Apply

    Affin Bank Berhad is looking for new potential candidates to fill in for PERSONAL FINANCING CONSULTANT (SOUTHERN) position. If you currently looking for new job opportunities and qualified with the job desc, feel free to apply this job.

    Job Description

    OBJECTIVE:

    Plans, solicits and promotes Personal Financing-i Products through effective communication and marketing skills. Sales driven mindset to achieve the assigned target.
    JOB RESPONSIBILITIES :
    • Promotes Personal Financing-i products to selected organizations and segments.
    • Conducts product briefings, talks & marketing activities at respective organizations..
    • Pro-actively executes sales plans and manages potential customers.
    • Builds good rapport with branches & other relevant stakeholders.
    • Participates in sales activities and prepares sales reports.
    • Ensures confidentiality of customer information and compliance to the Bank’s policies and procedures.
    JOB REQUIREMENTS :
    • Degree/Diploma/Professional qualification in any discipline.
    • Minimum 2 years of working experience in sales & marketing.
    • Good sales, marketing and analytical skills.
    • Independent and results oriented.
    • Knowledge of banking industry and consumer banking products & services will be an added advantage.
    • Strong initiative and desire to meet and exceed sales target.
    • Have good communication and interpersonal skills.
    All interested applicants who meet the above criteria are invited to apply online through this advertisement 

    Company Overview

    Affin Bank Berhad is the financial holding company of Affin Islamic Bank Berhad, Affin Hwang Investment Bank Berhad, Affin Moneybrokers Sdn Bhd and AXA AFFIN Life Insurance Berhad. AXA AFFIN General Insurance Berhad is an associate company of Affin Bank Berhad.
    Affin Bank Berhad (AFFINBANK) provides a suite of financial products and services that is catered to both retail and corporate customers. The target business segments are categorized under key business units such as Consumer Banking, SME Banking, Corporate Banking and Treasury.
    Our tagline of “Banking Without Barriers” signifies the removal of boundaries within the processes of the Bank as well as it’s attitude in servicing its customers. The latter means reaching out to the customers, improving relationships with them, making each one of them feel privileged and enhancing a new approach to banking and changing the face of conventional banking.
    Visit us at www.affinonline.com. 

    How To Apply

    If you confident and feel that this job is suitable to you, go ahead take your action now.
    Hope you find your dream job in Johor, Melaka, Negeri Sembilan.
    Apply Online
